game.name: KODI
game.desc: KODI is a media player and entertainment hub. It allows users to play and view most videos, music, podcasts, and other digital media files from local and network storage media and the internet.

game.name: Midnight Commander
game.desc: Midnight Commander is a cross-platform file manager. It's a feature rich full-screen text mode application that allows you to copy, move and delete files and whole directory trees, search for files and run commands in the subshell. Internal viewer and editor are included. Keyboard required.

game.name: Openbox
game.desc: Openbox is a stacking window manager for the X Window System, the standard WM in LXDE. Openbox is designed to be very small, fast, low on RAM and is the best option for web browsing.

game.name: XFCE
game.desc: Xfce is a lightweight desktop environment for UNIX-like operating systems. It aims to be fast and low on system resources, while still being visually appealing and user friendly.
